panels.description: The presence of data in this graph means that some CoreDNS requests resulted in panic; you can see a specific error in the container logs
panels.title: CoreDNS panic count

targets.expr: sum(rate(coredns_proxy_request_duration_seconds_sum{proxy_name="forward", node=~"$node", job="node-local-dns"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) / sum(rate(coredns_proxy_request_duration_seconds_count{proxy_name="forward", node=~"$node", job="node-local-dns"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node)

panels.description: The presence of data in this graph means that some CoreDNS requests resulted in panic; you can see a specific error in the container logs
panels.title: CoreDNS Forward Healthcheck Failure Count

targets.expr:
sum(rate(coredns_cache_hits_total{node=~"$node", job="node-local-dns"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node)
/
(
sum(rate(coredns_cache_hits_total{node=~"$node", job="node-local-dns"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) +
sum(rate(coredns_cache_misses_total{node=~"$node", job="node-local-dns"}[$__rate_interval])) by (node) 
)

panels.description: The presence of data in this graph means that some CoreDNS requests resulted in panic; you can see a specific error in the container logs
panels.title: CoreDNS Forward Healthcheck Failure Count
